website_summaries.verdict: A compact white refrigerator with a scratch-resistant worktop that features 2.6 cubic feet of space.
pros: This smartly designed unit is just over 2 feet tall and features a built-in can dispenser as well as 2 1/2 wire shelves that can be rearranged to fit your needs
It is Energy Star-rated and has a reversible door to satisfy either right or left-handed individuals
cons: If the unit isn't properly adjusted (level), the door may have trouble staying closed

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these from Amazon. Both of them failed to hold the appropriate temperature. The second one took a couple of months to break so I was out of the return window and out of luck for a refund. I'm stunned actually. TWO of these in a row failed. The technology is well known. It's either sloppy manufacturing or a bad lot with poor quality control. Doesn't matter. I'll never buy another Danby product again. Why would I?
customer_reviews.author: Purplhayze

customer_reviews.title: This product is awful! It broke after 2 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful! It broke after 2 weeks and the company gave me such a run around that I decided to eat the $100 + I spent on it. In fact, this manufacturer is on my radar and I will not purchase from them again. In my mind they should have allowed me to ship it back at their expense and either refunded my money or sent another. Instead, they made me file a claim and had numerous pieces of info they needed (pictures, location in home....) before they would even consider a refund/replacement. DO NOT BUY FROM DANBY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Texizhome

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pay attention to the reviews, so my bad. Nice looking fridge, but minimum temperature obtainable was 42 degrees F. Close, but not safe for many foods. Replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Penny

customer_reviews.title: They were right
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have said, this refrigerator doesn't cool as much as it should. At it's coldest setting (which is set behind the refrigerator), it cycles between 41F and 45F consistently. Should go down to the upper 30s (they say 37F is ideal), but it doesn't. I like that it doesn't have a refrigerator section like other 'friges, but I'm disappointed. I guess if you like English beer (50F), this would be suitable, but barely adequate for office sodas. I'd still buy again because of the size, and lack of freezer wasting space, but it's a compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Arved G. Grass

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good small fridge. Couple negatives -- one is that the thermometer is at the back of the unit. I have it up on a shelf and so adjusting it is tricky. Second, the top shelf inside will get much colder than the lower shelves (that's expected, really, since that's how this kind of fridge has a freezer controlled from the fridge -- fortunately, turns out frozen eggs thaw just fine and can still be used. Plus I keep it a little less cold. You can be creative with the "soda can holders" in the door. Great places to put avocados!
customer_reviews.author: LB7

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice little fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fridge to put in our master bedroom's little en-suite half bath. There are probably a ton of similar models but I really like this one after having used it for over a year. The door organizer is nice for bottled water and there's a surprising amount of space in there because it doesn't have a freezer. The shelves are adjustable, sturdy and fit well. Runs quiet, doesn't seem to leak at all, has generally been super reliable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Love this mini fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I got my mini fridge yesterday & set it up in my kids church room. I read a lot of reviews where people said they received this fridge & it was dented or damaged in some way. My fridge arrived in perfect condition. It was packaged well not only in two boxes but surrounded by very thick styrofoam as well. This fridge is the perfect size & so far it seems to be keeping my sodas & waters cold. I'm pretty impressed with the amount of space inside too. I plan on filling it up to capacity. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: the freezer part wasn't freezing ice cbues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because of its review, but when i got it, i could not use it immediately cz i was in the process of moving. Upon hooking it up, I was very disappointed that i decided to get a separate freezer because DANBY's freezer wasn't freezing my foods. That was a waste of my money considering i was waiting for thanksgiving to get the deals they had for regular size refrigerators. So i ended up with this half-functioning item, a freezer and my new samsung 70 inch french door which i bought from Costco and love very much.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use this for anything other than cooling beverages like soda or beer, don't buy it. Even at the coldest setting, the temperature never gets down much below 49 degrees, which is fine for previously mentioned items, but not safe for food. I have a frig thermometer in the unit (bottom shelf is coldest at 49) and use a digital thermometer to temp beverages that have been kept in the unit for over 48 hours. The coldest reading I got on that was 47 degrees. Bought it to store the bounty of my CSA veggies that wouldn't fit in my regular frig, but can only use it as a beverage cooler.
customer_reviews.author: tosagayle

customer_reviews.title: And now three months later it only cool ls at 50 -51 degrees
customer_reviews.text: It had issues from day one not being able to keep it at one temperature. And now three months later it only cool ls at 50 -51 degrees. I am trying to contact Amazon about it and I am having no luck. The Danby company told me I had to go through Amazon to get a refund. Well, I am not able to find out how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: June Wilshusen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is fine, but the temperature control is on the BACK of the unit, difficult to access. To get to it I have to lift the unit off its stand, turn it around while holding it , and reach the control. It weighs 41 pounds and is difficult to move for someone 83 years old. I never heard of a refrigerator where the control is not accessible from the front. I think the design is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: alambert

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a deep scratch
customer_reviews.text: My fridge was delivered with a deep scratch on the door. I contacted the seller to ask for $20-30 off and I never received a response. That's disappointing. The compressor is a bit noisy, if you are right next to it. I'm using it in my 15ft vintage camping trailer, to replace the old ice box fridge. Nice design, decent fit and finish, good interior layout.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Lebov

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this unit today. After installing it in the basement with no obstructions around, balanced, it is only registering 46 degrees via a remote sensor that i put inside to check. This is after having been plugged in for 12 hours at the max (coolest setting) I will be returning this tomorrow if the temperatures don’t improve during the night. Have to say, it is pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jill and Sunil Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Makes a strange noise
customer_reviews.text: This product works well as a small refrigerator. It's only drawback is the strange loud popping sound it makes periodically. I wrote to Danby about this and received a prompt reply which said: "Not to worry this is normal. What you are hearing is the fan going on and off every 6-10 seconds, it is called force air cooling system. We have many people contact us about this, as it is alarming and their first instinct is that something is broken, however you can put your mind at ease, this is no indication of anything broken and the unit should continue functioning normally."
customer_reviews.author: Blufftrees

customer_reviews.title: Saves trips to the main refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Convenient addition to the enclosure. Checked temperature at slightly less than coldest setting and it registered 37 degrees. 2.6 cu ft gives good space for 12 oz cans in the rack and on the shelves. Space on door rack has room for 1 2ltr bottle or bottle of wine. Very quiet unit, had to stand over top of it to know that is was running. Only had it for 2 weeks, but so far so good. Was a commercial refrigeration service/install technician and found Danby compressors very reliable, but then most brands of compressors are reliable if they are originally installed correctly.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very low power usage; cold enough to freeze
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the refrigerator-only in our small camper, because I wanted to be able to make ice. Observation: this application was a very tight fit, so if yours is similar, be sure you have measured carefully. This unit sips power; 81W when running, and 0W when cycled off; should average about 25W-30W, so I feel confident I'll be able to run this on a solar system, BUT... It loses a star because it needs to on its highest setting to actually freeze; I suspect average power use will therefor be somewhat higher (but still workable).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Trott

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but VERY good
customer_reviews.text: I use this little fridge in my bedroom for keeping filtered cold water close. Also keep yogurt and meal replacement drinks handy. I read all the reviews and was a little concerned about how loud it would be when I am trying to sleep. Yes, you can hear when the compressor kicks on but it is not loud enough to bother me either awake or asleep. It also serves as a perfect height bedside table for my lamp, clock and radio. It is just 1.7 cu. ft. but it holds a lot. Good product and I would recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SJPJ

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Late and Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The fridge itself seems nice, unfortunately it arrived late and extremely damaged. It showed at the shipping facility and out for delivery for 10 days before it finally arrived. Once it got here, it looked like it had been dropped down a flight of stairs (see attached pictures). Amazon was great. Although they wouldn't allow me to return it, they did refund me the purchase price. For anyone looking to purchase any mini fridge, I would recommend buying it from a store where you can pick it up and verify its not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love the can/water bottle slots on the door
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my office at work. It is quiet and keeps everything cold. Does not come with a freezer compartment, but honestly those little things never seem to work well. Love the can/water bottle slots on the door. I was originally going to purchase a stainless steel mini fridge but so glad I went with the black. Looks sleek and stays clean. Best price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Warmness does eventually cool off randomly to a cool temp
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Mint condition, literally and absolutely no damage. Came packed in two boxes, and two layers of Styrofoam. Have had some pop sitting in there for a few hours, they're cold. Makes 0 noise, gets kind of warm on the sides but that's normal I figure for a fridge. Warmness does eventually cool off randomly to a cool temp. 500 mL bottles don't fit standing up right and a lunch cooler fits in the fridge... just the door won't shut. Which is okay, I bought it mainly for pop and smaller items that need to be cold. Pretty good mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, inexpensive unit for college room
customer_reviews.text: For a new college student. Nice looking fridge that is small enough to fit under the loft bed and holds quite a bit. Used for soda, snacks, sandwiches, fruit, and cold cuts. Keeps everything cooled properly.
customer_reviews.author: Old Sparkie

customer_reviews.title: the best setting found was a minimum of 29°F with a ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a black uncalibrated knob in the back that is supposed to be used to adjust temperature. The default setting caused all refrig contents to freeze and here is no way to know temperature. So I bought a refrigerator and a freezer digital wireless thermometer which also display minimum and maximum temperatures. After several days of adjusting, the best setting found was a minimum of 29°F with a maximum of 40°F, all without opening the refrig door. This huge swing is totally unacceptable. I don't recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brace

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is great. It's extremely quiet and gets very cold
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is great. It's extremely quiet and gets very cold. I'm an uncultured heathen so I use it to keep my cheap American beer as cold as possible. I didn't notice an odor in my unit, and despite the very angry FedEx driver's violent delivery to my third-floor apartment the unit arrived in perfect condition. For reference I bought from Amazon and not a third party seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S

customer_reviews.title: Not that cold.
customer_reviews.text: First one did not turn on for a couple of days so. I returned it. I called the manufacturer be I did, but could not get through. The second one I have it turned up all the way and it keeps it cold, but not that cold. This is really only design to keep just drinks cold where you only open it once a day. Not for regular use. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Christensen

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD FRIDGE!!
customer_reviews.text: It did come with small dent but I do not even care because it works so well! I have had this almost a month and the Ice cube trays I bought come out smoking and crackling cause the freezer gets so cold! It does not have a fake "freezette", it has a real freezer. It goes up to 7 on the thermostat and I have It on 6. Freezes Ice In like an hour or so. Its much bigger than I thought too! fridge is very cold. Even builds up frost in freezer! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Aherns

customer_reviews.title: Different features than the usual mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time finding a mini fridge like this one. It has a separate freezer compartment instead of the freezer with the flap door that always freezes over. Also, the door had actual shelves made of sturdy material and they are adjustable- doesn't have that can dispenser that most of them have. Inside the shelves are glass and don't just lay on the pegs, but they actually fit into slots so they won't slide out. Very quiet. My original one shipped damaged, and they replaced it immediately! Extremely happy with this transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact fridge, adjustment knob COULD be difficult to reach depending on application
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about purchasing a compact fridge online and my fears were completely put to rest. This refrigerator is being used in an office and placed under a desk. It was delivered without any damage and is double boxed, so the chances for damage is mitigated very well. The fit was perfect for under a desk. The only knock I would say is the temperature control. It is a knob on the backside of the fridge and while we never really touch it once set, it is a pain if adjustment is needed. It has been in use for over a month now without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: moda_way

customer_reviews.title: so it works great for our purposes
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our home office/baby room, to store bottles, baby food, and random snacks. It's small, quiet, and works perfectly - although if there's one caveat, it's that the tiny freezer doesn't really freeze anything. We failed at keeping ice in there. But, I figured that's to be expected, given the size of the thing. We didn't buy it for the freezer, so it works great for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: mrshawkeye83

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I took my fridge out of the box and plugged it in, following the directions in the manual, but it didn't power on at all. We tried plugging it in to different outlets and tried several different things that may have helped it work. However, it never turned on and I missed the 30 day return window. A waste of $100. I'll go with another brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: McCalvin

customer_reviews.title: Great mini-fridge, but...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes this would be a great purchase. On the plus side, the refrigerator seemed very-well made, and the size was perfect for a case of beer and two bottles of wine. The temperature control was just a little too touchy for me. I couldn't get the setting to my desired coldness. The Danby customer service person was very concerned, but as the manufacturer, they don't handle these issues, the seller, Amazon does. Amazon was very helpful making the return of this item easy and painless. I think Danby makes a good product, but I just couldn't make it work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent temperature.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor temperature control. If you open it, even for a second, the temperature drops drastically. The adjustment on the back is difficult to use, one slight touch sends the temperature sky rocketing up or down. This would be ok for cans of soda or beer but would not recommend for anything that might spoil.
customer_reviews.author: DJF

customer_reviews.title: Really great fridge. Freezer only average.
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this fridge. Sits right next to my bed and is quiet for the most part. Looks very nice as well. Will kick on once in a while and make some noise, but nothing major. I will say, if you’re buying this fridge to use the freezer compartment for ice, don’t. It won’t actually freeze any ice or keep it frozen. It just isn’t powerful enough given the shared space with the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up and no freezer
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a similar sized fridge at work, but one with those completely useless freezers. Eventually, once the ice growth got the point where I couldn't close it, I just got rid of the old one and purchased this fridge; excellent choice. First of all, because there is no freezer, it means that I have more room to put stuff. The drink rack on the side is also an excellent use of space. The temp can be controlled via back dial; I have no idea what setting I have it set at, but it's definitely cold enough. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Harry M. Shin

customer_reviews.title: Nice frig but has dents
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this frig and others also. The complaint was they had big dents upon arrival. This is a nice frig but it did have 2 dents in it on both sides. It was a gift and I hated that it looked beat up, but did not want to deal with returning it. If you are into looks you may want to consider buying locally where you can check it out or at least get a discount on a damaged item.
customer_reviews.author: Pam L. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Design asks some questions, but works fine
customer_reviews.text: Really thought this fridge did not have a freezer, but mine does so maybe I misread. As spacious as it needs to be. Top fridge rack can only hold a single row of cans or bottles on their side, lying down, which is disappointing. It is about 1/16" too short to hold cans vertically or a double stack horizontally because the condensation tray blocks them. The tray is removeable, but then water leaks onto your drinks. Otherwise, what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Beef Rocksteak

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give a ZERO star rating. I checked out your advertisement including the picture of the interior of the refrigerator. The one I received is NOTHING like the one advertised. Your redesign of the door eliminated much needed space for my eggs,(why I bought it)!. Instead of getting 6-8 dozen per shelf, now I can get only 4 dozen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ski

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $150
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my game room but when it arrived it had a dent on one side. Not bad but it had apparently been mishandled. Of course they won't return or replace it. Also it is not super cold like most refrigerators. It is cool but my beer isn't cold. I would recommend looking at another model. The repair and replacement are issues. I surely would not buy the extended warranty.
customer_reviews.author: dunck

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator is super quiet!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this mini fridge for my office, it was the perfect size for what I needed! I love the brushed steel look and it is super quiet. The freezer is pretty small but I don't really need it except for a tray of ice cubes, so if you want to keep frozen foods this model is probably not the best choice. I am happy with my purchase and I would recommend the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Temperature.... Customer support
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator will only go down to 39 degrees.... I want the temp to be around 34.. I called Danby. The woman tells me that the normal temp for a refrigerator should be 40 degrees!!! WHAT??? My next door neighbor has a Galanz mini fridge and it works GREAT..... Makes mine look like a piece of garbage....
customer_reviews.author: W. Bendel

customer_reviews.title: Consistant
customer_reviews.text: I have this sitting in front of a floor length window and it has kept cream from spoiling for a month. What more can you ask? Usually holds the following: a quart of iced coffee, a pint of cream, 8 cans of soda water, 12 bottles of water, 8 protien shakes, my lunch. Sits in the sun and doesn't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gunn

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 Months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of June 2018, and by Christmas of the same year the fridge is no longer working. We've tried replacing the relays, etc and no luck. We're outside the return window by 2 months. It feels very wasteful to have such a big piece of garbage that lasted for such a small time. This was in an office to keep drinks cool and was maybe opened 1-3 times a day, hardly heavy usage. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for food
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot time troubleshooting with manufacturer on this fridge bc it barely got cold. After a lot of work still did not get cold. So if you buy this for keeping drinks cool that may work. But dont put food in it bc it may spoil. Of course this just might be my unit. Maybe other units get colder.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Barns

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Unit!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3.2 cu Compact Spotless Steel refrigerator for my office since we can have refrigerators at work. Really nice unit and fits well in my office. Has plenty of space and the small freezer compartment lets me put the frozen dinner I bring daily for lunch into it perfectly. Looks nice and is really quiet. So far it's a great unit and I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my friend, he’s pretty lazy so I bought it to support his bad habits. Anyway, this fridge works great so far, I bought the insurance (optional) to compliment it as I’ve never purchased anything from this company before. He’s only had it for about a week so if anything comes up I’ll update the review. Hoping it lasts. Also the shipping company (UPS) did a good job shipping it, don’t know how it is in other areas but I recommend picking it up from the UPS office if possible, I’ve had a few mishaps in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Darren John

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, unreliable refrigerator. DO NOT PURCHASE. This unit functions WARM, at 48+ degrees. Industry standard in below 41 degrees for the refrigerator. Above this temperature it's unsafe to store near, fish, and dairy. The freezer doesn't freeze. Look for a refrigerator that has a SEPARATE door for a freezer and for a refrigerator. These work the best.
customer_reviews.author: MOSHE

customer_reviews.title: is legit
customer_reviews.text: After reading way too many reviews for a mini fridge, i landed on this guy. it came in good condition and i actually opened the owners manual and saw to let the thing sit there for several hours before plugging it in to let the cooling liquid settle properly in case the thing was put in the truck sideways. the cooling system seems to be where most of these things break. anyways its exactly what its supposed to. ill update again once it breaks
customer_reviews.author: Jahhweh

customer_reviews.title: Glad I followed my gut
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator arrived on time and without any damage or issues. Once I cleaned it out and plugged it in, it took no time at all to reach the right temperature. It is very quiet and works like a charm. I'll keep my eye on the energy bill to see how much energy it consumes. So far I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina - The bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this item.
customer_reviews.text: This item is a piece of junk. First of all the door pops open each time you close it even though it has a magnetic clamp. Secondly this refrigerator does not get below 40 degrees and that is with the dial turned all the way up. Personally I want a cold drink not one that is lukewarm.I have owned several small refrigerators in my lifetime and this one is not worth the money or the aggravation. I really got screwed on this one. dstouffer@cox.net.
customer_reviews.author: Don S.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on Receipt
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that the packaging on this unit had no evidence of damage and the packaging was very well designed the unit did have damage at the time of receipt. There were five dents on the right side of the unit which I reported to the manufacturer but since they're hidden in our cabinet we don't care about them. However, on the interior, the vegetable bin had two large cracks in it. I did report this to the manufacturer and they are replacing it without problem. I'm posting this just for feedback to the shipper and to Amazon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dave Davison

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 12 months of getting.... was subjected to low stress use... very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nana S.

customer_reviews.title: and its perfect, no flaws
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, and its perfect, no flaws.... if anyone says they have dents LOOK AT HOW THE UPS DRIVER HANDLES THEM I watched mine and told him to NOT ROLL OR THROW IT because thats excatly what he was doing!!!! and since i was able to be here upon delivery it was in perfect condition !!! SO AGAIN I say dont say bad things about dents until you see how your driver handles the product I LOVE MINE AND WOULD RECOMEND IT
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: Not cold enough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this fridge is a fridge only no freezer. It's at work under my desk and the size is perfect and it's quiet. Holds my coffee cream, lunch, a few sodas, water and yogurt. BUT... on the highest setting, it just doesn't get cold enough. It keeps my drinks and food cool enough to not spoil, but nothing is really "cold."
customer_reviews.author: Anika Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and eye twitching hum rattle, and now leaks horrible freon smell
customer_reviews.text: Very loud and eye twitching hum rattle. First couple 9f months it was quiet. Now it is an annoying level of shake rattle and roll sounds. Will not by another Danny product again. UPDATE 8/15/2018 Ok so not only does this have a very loud hum rattle. But now its leaking freon stinking up my home. Looks like this modal or brand is prone to freon leaks. I'm very disappointed, horrible product!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bacciagalupe

customer_reviews.title: Received the item in damaged (damage on the front door ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the item in damaged (damage on the front door - only door of the compact refrigerator. Though the damage is cosmetic, it was not noticed on the outermost box. The damage - purportedly from forklift was quite obvious when I have the inner box out. and actual damage was on the refrigerator door when I had refrigerator out of this inner box- vertical dent measuring 3" -4".
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son going away to college. When i took it out of the box -I realized it was damaged. It had a crease on the right side and on the door. Since it was cosmetic and shouldn’t affect operation (and it was taken out of box at school) I didn’t fuss with seller for a return but potential purchaser should be care to open immediately and check for damage
customer_reviews.author: Dave K., Auburn, NY

customer_reviews.title: Great small item when you don't need a freezer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple small fridge to hold drinks, etc for clients at the office, and this on fit the bill because it didn't have a freezer. All the space is dedicated to the refrigerator part (no freezer), and the added bonus of having 12 oz can holders in the door.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold however ice cubes are melted!
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent fridge, however to my dismay Costco was selling mini fridges for a similar price but with a larger interior. The downside to this machine is that the freezer compartment does not completely freeze my ice cubes even at the highest settings. However it is really great for the price. One of the greatest luxuries in life is having a mini fridge in your bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mickyilee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little fridge to put in my father in law’s bedroom and loaded it up with cans of Coke because he has mobility issues and having this fridge in his room means he doesn’t have to go all the way to the kitchen if he wants a Coke at night. So, being quiet was important and he says he doesn’t even hear it. The built in van holder is a very nice and useful touch.
customer_reviews.author: Benozzo

customer_reviews.title: I was worried when I read other reviews about the shipping container and the prospect of the product coming in damaged but it was perfect. We use this for beer and sodas
customer_reviews.text: This fridge came exactly as advertised. I was worried when I read other reviews about the shipping container and the prospect of the product coming in damaged but it was perfect. We use this for beer and sodas. It makes a great addition when space is tight. It is quiet and our electric bill has not increased with its use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: A good small fridge, best for cans
customer_reviews.text: We had a pre-existing under-the-counter space for a small refrigerator. Our last one lasted 22 years (not a Danby), but the manufacturer no longer makes that model. So this Danby was the largest unit that fit in the space. It seems to work well. My only complaint is that it is shallower than our previous fridge. That means not only are the shelves not as deep, but the door shelves are not as deep. It's okay if you just want to put cans on the door shelves, and it has one place where you can actually put a full-size bottle. I guess a follow-up review might be more helpful if this doesn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For ice cold but never exploded a drink cold!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot brag on this fridge enough. It keeps my drinks super cold even in the door but had NEVER frozen one.
customer_reviews.author: Book reviewer 2005

customer_reviews.title: Great office fridge
customer_reviews.text: I ended up replacing a different office fridge b/c my lunchbox barely fit. Plus I never used the freezer so it just took up space. This fridge doesn't have a freezer which was actually the main reason I was interested. The can storage is also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Avoid - Not Safe for Food
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews, but this mini fridge only goes down to about 42 F and it hovers around 45 F. This is above the safe food storage temperature, rendering the fridge usefulness for storing food. From looking at other Amazon reviews, it seems that this is a common complaint with this fridge. Avoid purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard liu

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last one year before it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a little less than a year ago, and left a positive review a week or so thereafter saying it does what anyone would expect a fridge to do - keep stuff cold and not make a lot of noise doing it. Well, last night it just stopped working. Conked out completely. The compact fridge I owned before this one lasted ten years. Figured they must have gotten even better since then but apparently I was wrong. Maybe you'll have better luck, but I'll be looking at other brands now.
customer_reviews.author: David Hofstede

customer_reviews.title: DANGER - Internally Arcing - DANGER
customer_reviews.text: After a week of use, the fridge starting periodically emitting a loud popping sound. This appear to be the sound of an electrical short arcing. The fridge is working; however, I am wary about a possible shock hazard. I don't recommend anyone purchasing this use. I think it could be a shocking experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This refrigerator completely died
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an office refrigerator, so it doesn't even get used often and it completely died 8 months after having it. We cannot get in touch with customer service via calling or placing a work order online (multiple times). *** I have never written a bad review for anything, but don't want this to happen to someone else. Maybe the company will see this and contact me?! ***
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good refrig!
customer_reviews.text: This is larger than a college small refrig and holds lots of drinks! I put it in a guest bedroom and it is a big larger than I likely need - not noisy - and gets VERY cold when turned up - it has a dial on the top so you can regulate the temp. It is black and smooth and looks great in the bedroom. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy A.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look and space this mini fridge offers
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and space this mini fridge offers, also its quiet. I bought the 2.6 cubic feet model. I keep mine in my room and never really notice the noise even with the compressor running. My only complaint is that it hovers between 38-40 degrees Fahrenheit at max cool. This is fine for me as I use it primarily for beer and snacks, but if you want to store milk or raw meats it might not be cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Black Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Good but maybe just a tad noisy/distracting..
customer_reviews.text: Good product, got for my mom to use in her upstairs bedroom to replace her old one that broke. A tad but noisy, you don't notic3 it diring the day but lying in bed in a quiet room when you are trying to sleep, the sound is noticeable and can be a bit of a distraction. At least that's the feedback I got from her. Hopefully she can get used to it to the point it becomes second nature. She said it doesn't bother her 'too' much, it was just something she noticed whenever she's ready to go to sleep. It was a small distraction but she said she could live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Panda

customer_reviews.title: This was a big help.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I am a 100% Disabled Veteran so can't make trips to our normal refrigerators. It was a big problem having to ask my wife to get what wanted or needed. Moved the new one closer to me and I can get what I want. Takes a burden off of my wife lets me do something for my self.
customer_reviews.author: WLR

customer_reviews.title: Coldest one we have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: Saw this first in a hospital room. It was really cold. Nothing like the ones in hotel rooms. Really cold. Ordered this for hubby’s office. Cold in hours. Fantastic. Wish our motor home fridge was this cold.
customer_reviews.author: HARRIS'

customer_reviews.title: What is sad, is that I could have bought a better ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the unit, and unboxed it, I noticed that the unit does not have a freezer compartment. I was going to ship it back to Amazon, but the return shipping was going to be more than half of what the unit cost, and made returning it uneconomical. The refrigerator, did not get cold (unless you count mid 40's as cold), with the thermostat set to max. The unit died after about 5-6 weeks. What is sad, is that I could have bought a better (bigger) mini refrigerator for the same price by walking into Walmart. Save your money, and avoid the headache that this product was. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: like the one I had 20 years ago in my ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap fridge, like the one I had 20 years ago in my college dorm. Plastic, metal loose shelves, blah blah. Cheap. The worst part is that the temp knob is outside on the back. I bought it to purmy under my counter but now that won't work cause I'd hafta pull it out to adjust the temp. Stupid, poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: delighted to finally find a small refrigerator without the stupid fake tiny freezer that only freezes stuff directly UNDER it! I use this in my workshop for my employees to put their lunch and snacks in--works great, with no half frozen stuff.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with my purchase thus far
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase thus far. I plugged it in on Thursday and have had it going since. Keeps food and drinks at the perfect temperature! Got for my office at work and have no complaints! If anything happens will update but otherwise happy! Packaging was great! Original box was foamed inside another box. Temperature inside fridge is within safe, you can even get it colder if you would like with the dial on the back which says to turn to the right or the larger blue to increase the coldness. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all refrigerator, but terrible customer/parts support
customer_reviews.text: A good size office/den refrigerator without an unnecessary freezer compartment. However, Danby customer service and parts department can't get it together when it comes to ordering additional shelves Case # CASE79194
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WRITTEN A REVIEW BEFORE
customer_reviews.text: Item came in dented and the bottom of the box was missing. Was not home. would have refused it had I known. without complete box it is difficult to return. seems to work OK. To early to tell. one of the dents is in the middle of the door. destroys the appearance of an otherwise attractive addition to my man cave.
customer_reviews.author: Burnie Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Master Bedroom Must Have ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and size for our master bedroom. Keeps beverages perfectly chilled ... stocks up a week's worth of nightly libations. Not too, too loud. Once you get used to the murr-murr ... it just becomes background noise and hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Pod Princess

customer_reviews.title: Louder than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Louder than I thought. I purchased this compact fridge to replace the one I currently have in my bedroom. I read this fridge was one of the more quiet ones but boy were they wrong. I'm writing this review at 3:10 in the morning because the compressor just woke me up. I supposed if you keep this in your office it will be fine. But for people who like to have a fridge close by their bed it's not meant for them. I took a 50 dollar loss to return it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Came severely dented in one corner but working, I wanted to return it but it was too much of a burden as I am 72 and struggle with neuropathy so I am just going to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: wbrown3344

customer_reviews.title: It was a decent price, and the right size ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent price, and the right size. I just wish it kept things colder. Things will definitely be colder than room temp - just not as cold as your normal fridge. It sits in my home bar and does the job for mixers and such, where I can add ice anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom to store lunch and my breast milk (nursing mom over here), and it works perfectly! Super light weight and fits on top of my back counter. I never hear it. It was easy to get started and I could lift it myself. Keeps everything cold. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Good mini-fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a 1.7 cu ft mini-refrigerator. It uses a refrigerant and hence has a compressor. The interior has some useful shelves and it is reasonably quiet. Since this uses a conventional cooling mechanism it should be easier to control than a thermo-electric fridge and should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: albionphotoTop Contributor: Anime

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and very annoying for small office
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office and it makes an awful gurgling noise. I called the company and they told me this was normal. I have had it for less than a week and am returning it due to the noise. I saw reviews had mentioned the noise but others said they didnt notice so I thought I would give it a try. Very loud and very annoying for small office.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Works great, fits well in my office without being too ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fits well in my office without being too bulky. Plenty of room for different sized object. I feel that the tiny freezers in mini-fridges are almost worthless, so I like that the space isn't taken up here.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Gray

customer_reviews.title: Full stars, haven't used yet.
customer_reviews.text: To be totally honest, I'm only rating this product 5 stars because the delivery driver tried to hide my refrigerator under my welcome mat. I opened the door and a freakin' refrigerator is sitting on my front porch with my welcome mat laying on top of it. I appreciate and like the dude's effort. I really do.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Buescher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I have only had this refrigerator for a week. I chose it because it did not have a freezer. I did not want a freezer. It arrived in perfect condition and very quickly. I turned it on and it was pretty cold in no time at all. It is pretty much silent, every now and then I hear a quiet click when the cooler goes on. It's a great little refrigerator. I keep it in a bedroom that is rented and it is used for snacks bottled water and several other items. Absolutely nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Seems I am always purchasing items for our church. But when my pastor asked for a compact refrigerator - I figured I could pick one up in town. But that wasn't the case - so I went to Amazon. Had the perfect compact refrigerator made by a very good company. This is perfect for keeping water available in the pastor's office. Plus the price was awesome Mrs. Jones
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Willie Jones

customer_reviews.title: met my expectations for years.
customer_reviews.text: im satisfied with this product. it met my expectations. obviously there's always potential improvements for every product's weight, shell, and casing cosmetics; but i dont see cosmetics being a problem for this product's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Structure56

customer_reviews.title: Be present upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order yesterday and the refrigerator came dented in 2 places ☹️. The product itself cooled very quickly but it looks like whoever delivered it was not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very good but not five stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had the refrigerator at my office for about 1-1/2 months. I would have given it 5 stars except that sometimes I find when I haven't opened it in a while, such as after a weekend, it seems like it's not as cool as it had been before the weekend. I have had to adjust the temp setting about 5 times already.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Get one without a freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Freezer feature is awful. Every couple of months became a block of ice. Defrosting was a huge mess. Finally had to get rid of the thing. Avoid! (The refrigerator part worked well. Just ordered the version without the freezer. Which I had read the comments more carefully.)
customer_reviews.author: Joel C

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: cool fridge. moved back in with parents and need to keep my juice and lunches separate so they wont eat it. pretty spacious but it freezes in the back. like the bottom shelf froze with ice. i have it on full blast cold and so far no problems
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fridge. It's not loud and has plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge. It's not loud and has plenty of space in it. The one thing I'm not a big fan of is the gap between the grates on each shelf, but I just put a thin sheet of cardboard (from the divider in a 30-pack of Coor's Light) down and it alleviated the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Morbius858

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a great buy
customer_reviews.text: I guess the only thing I can say this doesn't have is a freezer area. But we didn't really need that, this product isn't too crazy expensive. I do wish it was a little cheaper but I got over it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fridge and its internal design. Very good quality and workmanship. Only one design flaw in my opinion only. The temperature adjust knob is in the rear of the fridge. Inconvenient if the fridge is in a cabinet or a closet where it would have to be pulled out to adjust. Im still happy with my purchase. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Truvvy

customer_reviews.title: Place to keep drinks  and protein shakes cold; coupled with small size and easy access.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice office refrigerator! Have used for two months now and I am very pleased with my purchase. No need to have a small freezer in this unit. I am so glad I found a small refrigerator that does not include a worthless freezer. I fully recommend this unit for keeping drinks cold and my bag lunch. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not a Beer Frig
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this refrigerator, set it up, put in the beer and waited- waited - waited for it to get cold. Called the company and they said the temperature should get to 33 degrees. Coldest it got was 40 degrees. We like COLD beer. So we exchanged it. Amazon was helpful and prompt with the exchange. Refrigerator number 2 does not get cold either. So if you want a small beer frig that keeps your beer good and cold this is not it. However, it is a very attractive looking small frig.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, seems pretty large inside
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, seems pretty large inside, but it didn't get items as cold as I hoped. Ranged around 40-45 degrees in shaded room and normal temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: APB3

customer_reviews.title: Luv this fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fridge for my tv room. Easily holds a case of beer and cools extremely well. Did turn the temp down to about 1/4 and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

product_meta.title: Danby Designer 2.6 cu. ft. Compact Refrigerator (DAR026A1WDD), White
product_meta.description:
Size:2.6 cu.ft.| Color:WhiteYou can add a touch of class to any room in your home or office with this striking compact refrigerator by Danby. It comes in at a height of just over two feet and features 2.6 cu. ft. (73 L) of cooling capacity. It’s the ideal unit for floors and countertops, making it the perfect fridge for spaces such as dormitory rooms and wet bars. Finding storage room for tall bottles is no problem at all and the third-generation CanStor beverage dispenser is second to none. Accessories can easily be stored on the scratch-resistant worktop and there’s no need to defrost the unit as it’s done automatically. This splendid appliance also comes with a mechanical thermostat and offers 2.5 strong wire shelves for maximum storage versatility. Both left and right-handed users will love the convenient reversible door swing and the integrated door handle.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
You can add a touch of class to any room in your home or office with this striking compact all refrigerator by Danby. It comes in at a height of just over two feet and features 2.6 cubic feet of cooling capacity. It’s the ideal unit for floors and countertops, making it the perfect fridge for spaces such as dormitory rooms and wet bars. This unit is Energy Star rated and used Eco-friendly, natural R600a refrigerant. Finding storage room for tall bottles is no problem at all and the third-generation CanStor beverage dispenser is second to none. Accessories can easily be stored on the scratch-resistant worktop and there’s no need to defrost the unit as it’s done automatically. This splendid appliance also comes with a mechanical thermostat and offers 2.5 strong wire shelves for maximum storage versatility. Both left and right-handed users will love the convenient reversible door swing and the integrated door handle. This compact unit also comes with a parts and labor warranty of 18 months.
feature_bullets: 2.6 cu. ft. (73 L) capacity compact all refrigerator
Energy Star compliant. Environmentally friendly R600a refrigerant. Automatic defrost system.
2 full width and 1 - 1/2 width adjustable wire shelves. Tall bottle storage - great for large soda bottles. CanStor beverage dispensing system.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,840 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
